page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE.JUNE 1985
page.content: My name is Charlotte Carr.I live in Lydbrook and this is a day in my life. {8am:}Got up and put on riding clothes.Went downstairs and gave pets their breakfast. {8.30am:}Had my breakfast.Took dog for walk. {9.30am:}Came back from walking dog.Sat out in the sun reading "Animal Ways". {10am:}Walked down to bus stop,caught bus to Coleford. {10.30am:}Arrived Coleford.Walked to riding stables. {10.45am:}Gave Kate (the horse) a light brush,tacked up. {11am:}Went out on Kate,galloped in woods. {12pm:}Back at stables,brushed Kate thoroughly.Led her to field.Came back, cleaned tack. {1pm:}Had jumping lesson on Juliet, a pony.
